item.title: SkyFuel - Drone Battery Management App
item.author: fievet.leon@free.fr (Léon Fievet)
item.description: SkyFuel is an Android application dedicated to the efficient management of drone batteries, allowing pilots and operators to maintain their batteries in good condition and optimize their lifespan.
